title: Womens Dress
title_original: Women's Shawl Wraps Open Front Travel Poncho Cape Warm Oversized Plaid Sweaters Casual Cardigan Shawls

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #45,950 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #113 in Women's Wraps & Pashminas #5,395 in Women's Sweaters

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Accessories > Scarves & Wraps > Wraps & Pashminas

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the shawl wrap stylish, with one noting it looks more expensive than it is, and appreciate its warmth, particularly for cold weather and church services. The product receives positive feedback for its quality, softness, weight, comfort, and wearability, with one customer mentioning it can be used as a blanket in the office. The length receives mixed reviews - while some say it fits well, others find it

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Shawl
items.body: Beautiful shawl, washes nicely, great size and so soft. Lightweight but very warm. Love it! Read more
items.author: Dreamer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and keeps me warm!!
items.body: Love this and the colors in this Poncho! Looks good with jeans, dress pants or skirt! Keeps me very warm without making me feel too heavy or sweaty!! Read more
items.author: camille m. warring

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cape
items.body: Love it. Looks great with jeans and boots. And quite warm. Read more
items.author: J. W. Gentry

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lite weight wrap
items.body: It is soft, a lite wrap great for cool weather have not washed yet Read more
items.author: Momofthree

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy and stylish
items.body: So cozy! Great deal for a warm shawl that can go with anything. I keep it in my office and it does not disappoint. Stays on and is comfortable to move in. Not too heavy and perfect size for covering me like a blanket when I need it. Read more
items.author: M S

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nicely made
items.body: I just bought this last week to pair with a top. It matched very well, and I was delighted that it was so soft. It may be too warm to wear when it's 95 degrees outside, but otherwise it is a nice weight and I can wear it most of the year in the office. I received several compliments. It is a very good value for the price, and seems nicely made. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does not hang nicely like the picture
items.body: Nice, thick fabric and comfy. Only problem is that it's so huge and I am small statured. It does not hang like the picture, does not drape nicely. Nice colors. Read more
items.author: Alexandra Berry

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile
items.body: I wore this a lot during my European vacation. The weather ranged from 40-60 degrees and this, with a long sleeve shirt was enough for me to stay warm. I love the colors and went well with many outfits. Dress it up or down. I paired this with a black skinny jeans and ranger boots. I’m 5-9 for reference. Read more
items.author: L. S.

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Series 03-beige Check, Series 01-wine Red, Series 03-leopard Purple, Series 01-stripe Khaki, Series 02-pink Black, Series 05-07-plaid Light Green, Series 05-03-plaid Beige, Series 03-dark Blue Flowering Shrubs, Series 05-04-plaid Black, Series 05-08-plaid Beige02, Series 05-navyblue Stripe, Series 01-black, Series 01-khaki, Series 05-08-plaid Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
